about.title: Hello, I’m Pawan!
description: I’m a lead .NET Full Stack Developer with 11+ years of experience crafting enterprise-grade web applications. I build end-to-end solutions that are fast, reliable, and ready to scale—bringing strong engineering fundamentals and modern development practices together.

I’m currently working at DXC Technology, I’m expanding my expertise into ML and AI-based solutions. I’m passionate about how intelligent systems can elevate traditional applications and create smarter, more adaptive digital experiences.

Turning creativity and technical knowledge into real, impactful products has been my passion for more than a decade. I love building solutions from scratch, improving existing platforms, and continuously learning the latest frameworks and technologies. My goal is simple: to build modern, user-focused experiences that deliver real value.

contacts.title: Get in Touch
